name: A Flower To Ty Daugther
description:
AWSD - Move 

Space - Jump (Only Shemrit can jump! her grandpa can't, he's too busy moonwalking)

R - pick up plants 

E - use portal 

P - restart level  

Shmerlit is on her quest to find the time space continuem flower that her biochemist nobel winning proffensional moonwalker granpa invented in the 80's, in order to go back in time and prevent the global warming apocalypse before it happened. Thankfully, her grandpa tries to help her by comunicating through the space and time continuum flower.
